venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
***There are still a handful of spots available, so rather than have anyone want to paypal last minute, we are going to allow payment at the door***

Don't miss this opportunity to work directly with New England's most amazing Didge player!

This workshop is designed to allow participants to effectively clear out energetic and emotional stagnation from each of the seven major energy centers (Chakras) of the body. Through his collection of concert class eucalyptus didgeridoos specifically tuned to the key of each Chakra, Joseph provides an atmosphere that not only reconnects the mind with the body but also allows participants to journey and meditate within each Chakra. The format includes a 3-minute opening meditation in the Crown Chakra followed by 6-8 minute meditations in the key of each subsequent Chakra. Through the process, participants will be guided to focus their awareness on the corresponding energy centers to promote clearing and connection with that center and with the energetic body. Participants are encouraged to bring meditation oils of their preference to the event. Presented by Joseph Carringer Joseph Carringer is a professional didgeridoo musician and sound therapist. He combines the theories of Traditional Chinese Medicine with Ayurvedic Chakra philosophies to create a unique and powerful sound healing experience. Joseph has been playing an Australian Aboriginal didgeridoo for over a decade, using it as a deep meditative tool in his personal shamanic journey as well as a therapeutic intrument for his clients. Please see www.DidgeTherapy.com for more information. This is a limited seating event - Pre-Registration is required Please go to http://www.thecenternh.com/events.htm and scroll down to this event to pay. Cost - $45 per person
item.name: Journeying Through the Chakras
